import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; import './Home.css'; import './App.css' import Services from "./components/Services"; function About() { return (

We are Arthitech. A Multidisiplinary Design Studio based in Istanbul. We are consist of experienced designers in the digital product industry. We design complex digital systems and solve complex design problems in a developer friendly way. Design for Everything you need.

Some of Our Services

Process

Design for Everything: From Startups to Coorporations.

We are bunch of designers who is designing digital products and experiences for years. We believe we have great sense of aesthetic. We mix that with our experience in creating basic to complex digital systems. We are capable of meet any kind of design needs you might have.

We hear your idea and shape it visible in the tech world. We provide a lot of service to meet our customer's need in the digital product industry. And our pricing policy depends on services you like to be served.

As our designers are multi-skilled, we have experience in the front-end development technologies. By using that, our design is developer friendly. We removal the conflict between design and development.

); } export default About;
